resources.string: Select to grant permissions to read and write to external storage. This is needed if you want to be able to read/write to the internal storage and read SD card.
Select to grant permissions to write to SD card. This is needed if you want to be able to write to the SD card (you can still read without this).
Select the server listening port. Android does not allow ports below 1024.
Start the server automatically on boot
Ports below 1024 are not allowed to be bound (Android limitation).
